trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="<Signature>" /> element of an XML signature.
trans-unit.target: Representa o elemento <see langword="<Signature>" /> de uma assinatura XML.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> class represents the <`Signature`> element of an XML signature defined by the XML digital signature specification.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> classe representa o <`Signature`> elemento de uma assinatura de XML definido pela especificação de assinatura digital XML.

trans-unit.source: The <`Signature`> element is the root element of an XML digital signature.
trans-unit.target: O <`Signature`> é o elemento raiz de uma assinatura digital XML.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignedInfo%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignatureValue%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.KeyInfo%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.ObjectList%2A> properties encapsulate the subelements of the <`Signature`> element.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignedInfo%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignatureValue%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.KeyInfo%2A>, e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.ObjectList%2A> propriedades encapsulam os subelementos do <`Signature`> elemento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <`Signature`> element, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o <`Signature`> elemento, consulte o W3C especificação em www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> class with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml> class to sign and verify an XML document using an envelope signature.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> classe com o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml> classe para assinar e verificar um documento XML usando uma assinatura de envelope.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> class with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml> class to sign an object and verify an XML document using a detached signature.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> classe com o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml> classe para um objeto de assinar e verificar um documento XML usando uma assinatura separada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> class with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml> class to sign and verify an XML document using an envelope signature.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> classe com o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml> classe para assinar e verificar um documento XML usando uma assinatura de envelope.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> class with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml> class to sign an object and verify an XML document using a detached signature.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> classe com o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml> classe para um objeto de assinar e verificar um documento XML usando uma assinatura separada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject" /> to be added to the list of objects to be signed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject" /> a ser adicionado à lista de objetos a serem assinados.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject" /> to the list of objects to be signed.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject" /> à lista de objetos a serem assinados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.AddObject%2A> method adds a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject> object to a collection that is accessible using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.ObjectList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.AddObject%2A> método adiciona uma <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject> objeto para uma coleção que é acessado usando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.ObjectList%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML representation of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a representação XML do <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature" />.

trans-unit.source: The XML representation of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature" />.
trans-unit.target: A representação XML do <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignedInfo" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignedInfo" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignatureValue" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignatureValue" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a ID do <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The ID of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature" />.
trans-unit.target: A ID do <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.Id%2A> property to add a string ID to the XML representation of the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> element.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.Id%2A> propriedade a ser adicionada a uma ID de cadeia de caracteres para a representação XML do atual <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The ID is used to reference the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> from another location.
trans-unit.target: A ID é usada como referência a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> de outro local.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> do atual <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo" /> do atual <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.KeyInfo%2A> property uses a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> object to represent the <`KeyInfo`> element of an XML digital signature.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.KeyInfo%2A> propriedade usa um <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> objeto para representar o <`KeyInfo`> elemento de uma assinatura digital XML.

trans-unit.source: For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre assinaturas digitais XML, consulte a especificação do W3C em www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> class with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml> class to sign and verify an XML document using an envelope signature.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> classe com o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml> classe para assinar e verificar um documento XML usando uma assinatura de envelope.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> class with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml> class to sign an object and verify an XML document using a detached signature.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> classe com o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml> classe para um objeto de assinar e verificar um documento XML usando uma assinatura separada.

trans-unit.source: The XML element from which to load the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature" /> state.
trans-unit.target: O elemento XML do qual carregar o estado <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature" />.

trans-unit.source: Loads a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature" /> state from an XML element.
trans-unit.target: Carrega um estado <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature" /> de um elemento XML.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="value" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter does not contain a valid <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignatureValue" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="value" /> não contém um <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignatureValue" /> válido.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter does not contain a valid <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignedInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="value" /> não contém um <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignedInfo" /> válido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of objects to be signed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma lista de objetos a serem assinados.

trans-unit.source: A list of objects to be signed.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de objetos a ser assinado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.ObjectList%2A> property uses a collection of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject> objects to represent the <`Object`> tag of an XML digital signature.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.ObjectList%2A> propriedade usa uma coleção de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject> objetos para representar o <`Object`> marca de uma assinatura digital XML.

trans-unit.source: You can also add a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject> to this collection using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.AddObject%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode adicionar uma <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject> para esta coleção usando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.AddObject%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre assinaturas digitais XML, consulte a especificação do W3C em www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor da assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains the value of the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de bytes que contém o valor de assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignatureValue%2A> property uses a byte array to represent the <`SignatureValue`> element of an XML digital signature contained within.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignatureValue%2A> propriedade usa uma matriz de bytes para representar o <`SignatureValue`> elemento de uma assinatura digital XML contido.

trans-unit.source: For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre assinaturas digitais XML, consulte a especificação do W3C em www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo" /> of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo" /> do atual <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo" /> of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo" /> do atual <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignedInfo%2A> property uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo> class to represent the <`SignedInfo`> element of an XML digital signature contained within.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignedInfo%2A> propriedade usa o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo> classe para representar o <`SignedInfo`> elemento de uma assinatura digital XML contido.

trans-unit.source: For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre assinaturas digitais XML, consulte a especificação do W3C em www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> class with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml> class to sign and verify an XML document using an envelope signature.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> classe com o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml> classe para assinar e verificar um documento XML usando uma assinatura de envelope.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> class with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml> class to sign an object and verify an XML document using a detached signature.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> classe com o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml> classe para um objeto de assinar e verificar um documento XML usando uma assinatura separada.
